Desc.entry: Traditional Shotokan Karate for ages 7-70 years, families/groups are welcome. Provides a path/way to self improvement. Enhances job/university prospects for the young. Real educational links and grades. Addresses matters of self control, respect, confidence building, self defence, female awareness, focus and fitness. Aims to deliver a complete package traditionally based and addressing up-to-date needs. Provides quality control through club independent grading. Beginners welcome, first lesson free. Karate syllabus for GCSE and A level in Physical Education approved by the AQA, Edexcel or OCR Examining boards. High grade instruction, provided by club founder members with 50 years of experience between them. See website for further details.

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - KARATE, TAEKWONDO AND TANG SOO DO
